name: Puzzle Adventure (d14u82)
description:
This is my Puzzle Adventure Project. Find the keys and reach the goal while destroying monsters on your way.

Here are some modifications:

  1. Changed Main Menu background to reflect actual game.
  2. Added high score to Main Menu screen.
  3. Changed color of some UI elements.
  4. Included Instructions.
  5. Included Credits.
  6. Moved title to reflect nicely across background image.
  7. Created entirely different first level with a few challenges.
  8. Wrote a script for enemies to give you points upon destruction (instead of using score pickup).
  9. Added high score to level UI.
  10. Level 2 is unchanged (for now).
  11. Added some obstacles by replacing some background tilemap with foreground tilemap leaving players to find another way. Also, watch out for the hole as I replaced a solid foreground with a background tilemap (you can fall through it).
  12. Added an inspirational word into the background images... can you read it?
